title: SimCasino
body:

Screenshots (Click to enlarge)


Repack Features

  • Based on SimCasino-PLAZA ISO release: plaza-simcasino.iso (2,068,643,840 bytes)
  • 100% Lossless & MD5 Perfect: all files are identical to originals after installation
  • NOTHING ripped, NOTHING re-encoded
  • Significantly smaller archive size (compressed from 1.9 to 1 GB)
  • Installation takes 2-3 minutes
  • After-install integrity check so you could make sure that everything installed properly
  • HDD space after installation: 5.8 GB
  • Language can be changed in game settings
  • At least 2 GB of free RAM (inc. virtual) required for installing this repack

Game Description

The Full Casino and Resort Tycoon Experience
3D graphics. Deep systems. Massive customization and creativity. Extensive mods. AND full soundtrack, from world-renowned composer Jerry Martin!

You are the Casino. Does the House Always Win?
You set the odds! Thieves, cheaters, and criminals can tilt the odds against you! Deter them with cameras and interrogation rooms! If you want to manage every last chip in the casino’s vault, micro-manage the games & odds on slot machines, keep tabs on every deck of cards, or even design the ultimate high-efficiency staff schedule & security patrol scheme — you can do all of that, and a lot more!

Workshop Support
Everything from custom pictures, floors, walls, slot machine games, TV videos, and even code! Share your casinos and mods on the workshop!

Get Creative – Customize & Design Every Aspect
This isn’t a one size fits all kind of game. Build luxury hotels or cheap no-frills casinos. Choose every finish, from the walls & flooring styles, the lighting, the counter-top & bar-top materials, even the restroom stalls. After building your huge resort, walk around it with our first person mode!

Huge Number of Building Options!

  • Slot Machines – Table Games – Sports Betting – Jackpot Displays
  • Bingo – Theatres – Dressing Rooms – Dance Floors – Gyms
  • Single & Multi-Guest Bedrooms – Luxury Rooms with Wet Bars & Hot Tubs
  • Buffets – Bars – Vending Machines – Lounges
  • Plants – Signs – Wall Decor – Lights & Neons – Themed Decor
  • Computer Rooms – Meeting Rooms – Conference Halls
  • ATMs & Cashier Cages – Security Cameras – Interrogation Rooms
